com.salimov.yurii.service.data.interfaces

Interface CompanyService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContentService<Company,java.lang.Long>, DataService<Company,java.lang.Long>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompanyServiceImpl

    public interface CompanyService
extends ContentService<Company,java.lang.Long>
    The interface of the service layer, describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Company class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Company, ContentService, DataService

                   java.lang.String googleMaps,
                   java.lang.String logoUrl,
                   boolean isValid)
        Initializes, saves and returns a new company.
        Parameters:
        title - a title of the new company.
        domain - a domain of the new company.
        tagline - a tagline of the new company.
        description - a description of the new company.
        information - a information of the new company.
        keywords - a keywords of the new company.
        mobilePhone - a mobile phone of the new company.
        landlinePhone - a landline phone of the new company.
        fax - a fax of the new company.
        email - a e-mail of the new company.
        vkontakte - a vkontakte url of the new company.
        facebook - a facebook url of the new company.
        twitter - a twitter url of the new company.
        skype - a skype username of the new company.
        address - a address of the new company.
        googleMaps - a google maps url of the new company.
        logoUrl - a logo URL to the new company.
        isValid - a validated of the new company.
        Returns:
        The new saving company.
        See Also:
        Company

                      java.lang.String address,
                      java.lang.String googleMaps,
                      java.lang.String logoUrl,
                      boolean isValid)
        Initializes, updates and returns object of class Company. Returns null if id is null.
        Parameters:
        url - a url of the company to update.
        title - a new title to the company.
        domain - a new domain to the company.
        tagline - a new tagline to the company.
        description - a new description to the company.
        information - a new information to the company.
        keywords - a new keywords to the company.
        mobilePhone - a new mobile phone to the company.
        landlinePhone - a new landline phone to the company.
        fax - a new fax to the company.
        email - a new e-mail to the company.
        vkontakte - a new vkontakte url to the company.
        facebook - a new facebook url to the company.
        twitter - a new twitter url to the company.
        skype - a new skype username to the company.
        address - a new address to the company.
        googleMaps - a new google maps url to the company.
        logoUrl - a new logo URL to the company.
        isValid - a validated of the article.
        Returns:
        The updating company with parameter id.
        See Also:
        Company

        Updates the main company.
        Parameters:
        title - a new title to the main company.
        domain - a new domain to the main company.
        tagline - a new tagline to the main company.
        description - a new description to the main company.
        information - a new information to the main company.
        keywords - a new keywords to the main company.
        workTimeFrom - a new start work time to the main company.
        workTimeTo - a new finish work time to the main company.
        mobilePhone - a new mobile phone to the main company.
        landlinePhone - a new landline phone to the main company.
        fax - a new fax to the main company.
        email - a new e-mail to the main company.
        senderEmail - a new sender e-mail to the main company.
        senderPass - a new sender password to the main company.
        vkontakte - a new vkontakte url to the main company.
        facebook - a new facebook url to the main company.
        twitter - a new twitter url to the main company.
        skype - a new skype username to the main company.
        address - a new address to the main company.
        googleMaps - a new google maps url to the main company.
        logoUrl - a new logo URL to the main company.
        faviconUrl - a new favicon URL to the main company.
        slides - a slides to the main company.
        Returns:
        The updating main company.
